translation: Fallen from both, does he not perish like a rent cloud, supportless, O mighty-armed one, deluded on the path of Brahman?
commentary: 6.38 Is it that not not? Ubhayavibhrashtah fallen from both? Chhinnabhram rent cloud? Iv like? perishes perishes? Disreputable supportless? Mighty-armed O mightyarmed? confused deluded? Brahmanaá¸¥ of Brahman? path in the path.Commentary Both the path of Karma or the path of ritualistic activity in accordance with the Karma Kanda of the Vedas on the one hand and the path of Yoga on the other.Path of Brahman the
